org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 SaslNettyServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.security.SaslRpcServer
      • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.SaslNettyServer

  • public class SaslNettyServer
extends org.apache.hadoop.security.SaslRpcServer
    Encapsulates SASL server logic for Giraph BSP worker servers.
